about_the_game:
Streamline is a very early build of the FPS being developed by Watson Digital. Currently the game features local play (lan) and Steam multiplayer. You can also enable bots to create a hybrid environment of both real players and AI.

Game Modes:
  • Capture The Flag
  • Deathmatch
  • Team Deathmatch
  • Rush (plant / defuse)

Streamline is being built inside of Epic's Unreal Engine 4. With plans to migrate to UE5 when it becomes available.

content_descriptors.notes:
-Depictions of blood
-Graphic and realistic-looking depictions of physical conflict. May involve extreme and/or realistic blood, gore, weapons and depictions of human injury and death
-Depictions or dialogue involving slapstick or suggestive humor

name: Streamline

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: i3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GT 1030
  • DirectX: Version 11
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i9 9900k
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce RTX2080ti
  • DirectX: Version 12

short_description: Streamline is a very early build of the FPS being developed by Watson Digital. Featuring many game modes such as Capture the Flag, and Team Deathmatch.
